xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for determining differences between XML documents and nodes.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xmldiff:compare
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: xmldiff:compare($node-set-1 as node()*, $node-set-2 as node()*) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Compares two nodes sets to determine their equivalence.Equivalence is determined in 3 stages, first by sequence length, then equivalent Node types, and finally by XMLUnit Diff.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:boolean : Returns true if the node sets $node-set-1 and $node-set-2 are equal, false otherwise. This function is a simplified version of: xmldiff:diff#2 that only returns true or false.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: xmldiff:diff
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: xmldiff:diff($node-set-1 as node()*, $node-set-2 as node()*) as map(*)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Reports on the differences between two nodes sets to determine their equality.Equality is determined in 3 stages, first by sequence length, then equivalent Node types, and finally by XMLUnit Diff for Document and Element nodes, or fn:deep-equals for all other node types.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: map(*) : Returns a map(xs:string, xs:anyAtomicType). When the node sets are equivalent the map is: map {'equivalent': fn:true() }. When the nodesets are not equivalent, the map is structured like: map {'equivalent': fn:false(), 'position': xs:integer, 'message': xs:string}.
